mapper.select:
SELECT p.pn, p.name, p.email, p.phone_number, p.category_pn, p.content, p.process, p.deposit, p.input_date, p.update_date, p.note
,u.pn AS seller_pn, u.shop_url, u.id, u.enable, u.salt, u.name AS seller_name, u.contract_count, u.contract_end_date, ua.pn AS admin_pn, ua.name AS admin_name
FROM partnership p
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT us.pn, us.shop_url, u.id, u.enable, u.salt, u.name, uscit.contract_count, uscit.contract_end_date FROM user_seller us LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT usci.seller_pn, COUNT(usci.seller_pn) AS contract_count, now.contract_end_date FROM user_seller_contract_info usci LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT seller_pn, end_date AS contract_end_date FROM user_seller_contract_info WHERE SYSDATE() BETWEEN start_date AND end_date ) now ON usci.seller_pn = now.seller_pn GROUP BY usci.seller_pn ) uscit ON us.pn = uscit.seller_pn , users u WHERE us.pn = u.pn ) u ON u.pn = p.seller_pn LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT u.pn, u.name FROM user_admin ua, users u WHERE ua.pn = u.pn AND u.enable = TRUE ) ua ON ua.pn = p.admin_pn
WHERE
p.pn = #{pn}
p.email = #{email} AND p.process = 1
p.phone_number = #{phoneNumber} AND p.process = 1
SELECT category_pn AS categoryPn FROM partnership WHERE pn = #{pn}
